translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a yurwardha ni bidhi:/
analyzed: a'a yurwardha ni bidhi:/
translated: Āyurvardhanavidhi

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Rite for Increasing Life

original: tshe 'phel ba'i cho ga / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: tshe 'phel ba'i cho ga / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble lady Tārā!

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas @278b sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas @278b sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
translated: As previously explained, one should meditate on white Tārā with one face and two arms,

original: skyol mo krung du bzhugs par bsgoms te /
analyzed: skyol mo krung du bzhugs par bsgoms te /
translated: sitting in the cross-legged posture.

original: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa bon gyi ge blta'o //
analyzed: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa bon gyi ge blta'o //
translated: At her heart, on a moon disc, one should visualize the seed syllable taṃ.

original: de la 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya can yum dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de la 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya can yum dang bcas pa /
translated: Light radiates from it, inviting the lord Amitāyus, white in color, with the mudrā of equipoise, together with his consort,🔽in the space in front.

original: phyag gi steng na rin po che'i bum pa can gyi mdun du mi bskyod pa sngon po g-yas pa sa gnon /
analyzed: phyag gi steng na rin po che'i bum pa can gyi mdun du mi bskyod pa sngon po g-yas pa sa gnon /
translated: In his right hand he holds a precious vase, and in front of him is blue Akṣobhya, pressing his left hand on the ground,

original: g-yon rin po che'i bum pa can gyis yum la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: g-yon rin po che'i bum pa can gyis yum la 'khyud pa /
translated: holding a precious vase in his right hand, and embracing his consort.

original: g-yas su rin 'byung gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas mchog sbyin /
analyzed: g-yas su rin 'byung gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas mchog sbyin /
translated: To the right is Ratnasaṃbhava, the color of refined gold, with his right hand in the boon-granting mudrā,

original: g-yon ni snga ma'i tshul dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: g-yon ni snga ma'i tshul dang mtshungs so //
translated: The left is the same as before.

original: rgyab tu rnam snang dmar po /
analyzed: rgyab tu rnam snang dmar po /
translated: In the back is red Vairocana,

original: g-yas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
analyzed: g-yas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
translated: with the mudra of supreme enlightenment on the right.🔽In the left is green Amoghasiddhi, with the mudra of giving refuge.

original: g-yon du don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya can te rigs lnga dang / yum thams cad ni rang snang gi yum mo //
analyzed: g-yon du don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya can te rigs lnga dang / yum thams cad ni rang snang gi yum mo //
translated: All the mothers are the self-appearing mothers.

original: de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor bar dmigs te /
analyzed: de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor bar dmigs te /
translated: Imagine that they are surrounded by an immeasurable assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: skyabs 'gro la sogs pa tshul bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: skyabs 'gro la sogs pa tshul bzhin du bya'o //
translated: One should properly go for refuge and so forth.

original: tshe 'phel bar gsol ba gdab pa ni /
analyzed: tshe 'phel bar gsol ba gdab pa ni /
translated: The supplication for increasing life is:

original: aom na mo bha ga wa te aa mi t'a bh'a wa ti ta th'a ga ta /
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga wa te aa mi t'a bh'a wa ti ta th'a ga ta /
translated: oṃ namo bhagavate amitābhavyūhaya tathāgatāya |

original: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tva sya aa ham a'a yurwardha ni /
analyzed: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tva sya aa ham a'a yurwardha ni /
translated: sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ | aham āyur vardhani |

original: pr'a na wardha ni /
analyzed: pr'a na wardha ni /
translated: prāṇa vardhani |

original: dz'i ba wardhu ni /
analyzed: dz'i ba wardhu ni /
translated: jīva vardhani |

original: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
translated: adhitiṣṭhādhiṣṭhite svāhā.

original: zhes pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa yab rnams kyis so so'i yum la bskul te tshe'i dngos grub brtan par byas nas /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa yab rnams kyis so so'i yum la bskul te tshe'i dngos grub brtan par byas nas /
translated: The fathers, Amitabha and so forth, exhort their respective mothers to stabilize the attainment of immortality.

original: bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te 'dug par bsam /
analyzed: bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te 'dug par bsam /
translated: Imagine that they enter into union and remain in that state.

original: bdag nyid kyang spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga kha phye ste snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa ka phye ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga kha phye ste snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa ka phye ste /
translated: Also, imagine that the cranial aperture at the crown of your head opens and the channels of the four elements located on the lotus at your heart open.

original: rtsa thams cad so sor kha phye bar bsam /
analyzed: rtsa thams cad so sor kha phye bar bsam /
translated: Imagine that all the channels open individually.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la 'chi med kyi dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la 'chi med kyi dbang bskur te /
translated: Then, all the tathagatas confer the empowerment of immortality upon you.

original: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun tshang pa'i bu ga nas blugs pas rtsa thams cad khengs pa dang / khyad par du chu skyes kyi rtsa lnga gang bas srog 'dzin pa rnal du tshud de 'chi ba med par bsam zhing sngags 'di nyer gcig bzlas so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun tshang pa'i bu ga nas blugs pas rtsa thams cad khengs pa dang / khyad par du chu skyes kyi rtsa lnga gang bas srog 'dzin pa rnal du tshud de 'chi ba med par bsam zhing sngags 'di nyer gcig bzlas so //
translated: A stream of awareness elixir fills your cranial aperture and fills all your channels, and in particular, the five channels of the heart lotus are filled, so that the life-sustaining energy current is brought under control and becomes immortal. Recite this mantra twenty-one times.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re a'a yurwardha ka dha bhya:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re a'a yurwardha ka dha bhya:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture āyurvardhaka dhā-bhyaḥ svāhā.

original: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snang ba mtha' yas la 'dus te /
analyzed: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snang ba mtha' yas la 'dus te /
translated: By this, the tathāgatas gather into Amitābha.

original: de dbu rgyan gyi tshul du bdag gi spyi bor byon pas tshe rtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dbu rgyan gyi tshul du bdag gi spyi bor byon pas tshe rtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He comes to my head in the form of a crown, and my life becomes firm.

original: gzhan rnams gshegs su gsol /
analyzed: gzhan rnams gshegs su gsol /
translated: The others are requested to depart.

original: des skyo nas ldang bar 'dod na mi dmigs pas zin pa'i dge ba bsngo'o //
analyzed: des skyo nas ldang bar 'dod na mi dmigs pas zin pa'i dge ba bsngo'o //
translated: If one wishes to rise from that, having been seized by non-observation, one should dedicate the virtue.

original: @279a * // snga ma ltar thun bzhi la sogs pa bsgoms na zla ba drug gis 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @279a * // snga ma ltar thun bzhi la sogs pa bsgoms na zla ba drug gis 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates in four sessions and so forth as before, in six months one will attain the power of immortality.

original: gzhan yang ci rigs pas kyang 'phel lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang ci rigs pas kyang 'phel lo //
translated: Moreover, it increases in whatever way is appropriate.

original: sgrol ma tshe spel ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa / slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: sgrol ma tshe spel ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa / slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The vidyā called “Tārā’s Life-Increasing” composed by Ācārya Candragomin is complete.

original: // / ma h'a pandi ta ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: // / ma h'a pandi ta ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas /
translated: By the great paṇḍita Ratnarakṣita,

original: lo ts'a ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos 'gyur ba'o//
analyzed: lo ts'a ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos 'gyur ba'o//
translated: the translator Zhang Thupwang Zangpo translated it.
